name: Road Course
overview: A chronicle of the highway tribulations on a man intent on reaching his destination. A man intent on revenge, a warrior. Billy was a Knight of the Road and knew no fear, no remorse and who followed no highway code. It's a touch, tarmacked world out here, and only the fit survive the high-octane, six cylinder turbo-nightmare we call the A47. Published in Commodore Format 1995/09 (Issue #60).
